subject: English
title: Chapter 28 From the Postbox 1
content:
--- Page 1 ---
Read the following and write your own messages. 6)

The Surprise

It was 5 September.
Teachers’ Day !
When the Teacher opened the postbox,
there was a surprise for her !
All the letters were for the Teacher.

Thank you,
Dear Teacher.
Thank you
so much.
* All your students of *

*: Standard Four «
x Division 'B' x
